channel.title: Pages on Carpentry at the University of Oslo
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Carpentry at the University of Oslo

item.description: Workshops # We organize workshops multiple times a year. The best place to learn more about our workshops or register for one of them is the University of Oslo Library’s Carpentry course catalogue. Inbetween workshops we meet for study groups. To learn more about the study group go here. Upcoming Workshops # Carpentry pilot Workshop (Online): Introduction to Conda for (Data) Scientists 8 January 2021, Online via Zoom Conda is an open source package and environment management system.
